about.name: Abhinav Rai
about.about: Hi, I am a software engineer with 3.5 years of experience. I have expertise in FrontEnd development.

experience.description: I am working here as a FrontEnd Developer. My job is to create pixel perfect UI as per design, integrate related APIs, create whole architecture for react/redux based app. Optimize website to improve performance. Debug project error and js warnings. Guide junior developers.

Worked as a FrontEnd developer where most of the work done using ReactJs and MaterializeCSS. My job was to handle the whole FrontEnd from UI to API integration. During my two years of tenure worked on 4 projects:- India website, US website, CRM, and CMS. Created all of them single-handedly from scratch including project setUp to interface design and API integrations. Also experimented many think to improve SEO and performance of the web-app.
Worked on Laravel based Web development project named Samarpan where I have to develop the whole UI using Materialize Bootstrap.
Worked as an Intern. Integrated Stripe Payment Gateway.

education.name: Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College, (AKTU | UPTU)

projects.title: Billing flow module
projects.description: Worked on a complete user journey from plan selection to payment. The main focus was to create reusable components, optimization. Created a mono-repo from common code which can be easily used by other projects too.

projects.title: Campaign checker
projects.description: Created a React-based pre-check email campaign tool to avoid errors in the campaign. It was two days competition where we have to finalize the idea and execute it. This tool provides facilities like spell-check, personalization check, broken-link check, missing alt tag of images, available credits check.

projects.title: React17-webpack5-boilerplate
projects.description: React17, webpack5, SASS, Eslint and many things to kick start a new project

projects.title: AFINOZ website
projects.description: Develop FrontEnd of Website using ReactJs, optimize website performance, API Integration. Create Custom templates for the same type of pages.

projects.title: CRM-Afinoz
projects.description: Develop FrontEnd of CRM using ReactJs/Redux, ChartJs and MaterializeCSS. Create customizable components which can be used in multiple containers, integrate APIs.

projects.title: CMS-Afinoz
projects.description: Develop CMS using rich text-editor, ReactJs and MaterializeCSS. Integrate related APIs.

projects.title: E-Petition
projects.description: It's a Web project to sign online petitions. Learned code-igniter and developer this portal in one week. Technologies used Php-CodeIgniter, MySql, HTML, CSS, Material Design Lite, JavaScript, Jquery, Ajax.

projects.title: Samarpan
projects.description: It's a Laravel based web development project for using Senior citizens experience in Industries. My job is to create FrontEnd of the whole portal using Materialize-Bootstrap.

projects.title: Question Paper Portal
projects.description: It is a Modal Question Paper Upload Portal where faculty will upload their question with answers and students can see those questions online or download them. Technologies is using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, PHP/MySql, BootStrap, CK-Editor.

awards.title: 1st prize in Sibthon2020 (Hackathon)
awards.details: Created a React-based pre-check email campaign tool to avoid errors in the campaign. It was two days competition where we have to finalize the idea and execute it. This tool provides facilities like spell-check, personalization check, broken-link check, missing alt tag of images, available credits check.

awards.title: Won 2nd Prize in CodeWiz
awards.details: It's an Intra college competitive programming event where I won 2nd Prize.

awards.title: Won 2nd prize in Web-Development
awards.details: Won 2nd prize in Web-Development in DDUC (Deen Dayal Upadhyaya College).

awards.title: Appreciation Letter
awards.details: Worked in State level project to generate 'Modal Question Papers' for which received an appreciation letter from Director of College.
